artifact.content: Use Case Number: UC1 Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: A Caller wishes to make a phone call to another phone user (Callee). The phone number is passed as an input System: The Resource Manager checks for available phone lines while the Call Manager implements the phone connection to process the call. Actors: Caller (initiator), Callee Overview: This use cases captures the process of making a successful phone connection from a Caller to a Callee. The connection is initiated by the Caller

Use Case Number: UC2 Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator wishes to retrieve a user�s account information. System: The Administrator uses the system console as an interface to the system server. Actors: Administrator (initiator), system console Overview: This use case captures the process of logging into the system console

Use Case Number: UC3 Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator wishes to retrieve account information. The search criteria (ie. Account number) is passed as the input. System: The Administrator uses the system console as an interface to the system server. Actors: Administrator (initiator), system console Overview: This use case captures the process of retrieving and viewing the account information linked to a specified search criteria.

Use Case Number: UC4 Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator wishes to modify a customer�s account information. The account number is passed as the input. System: The Administrator uses the system console as an interface to the system server. Actors: Administrator (initiator), system console Overview: This use case captures the process of editing a customer�s account information on the system console

Use Case Number: UC5 Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator wishes to suspend a user�s account. The account number is passed as the input. System: The Administrator uses the system console as an interface to the system server. Actors: Administrator (initiator), system console Overview: This use case captures the process of an administrator suspending a user�s account on the system console.

Use Case Number: UC6 Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator wishes to delete a user�s account. The account number is passed as the input. System: The Administrator uses the system console as an interface to the system server. Actors: Administrator (initiator), system console Overview: This use case captures the process of an administrator deleting a user�s account on the system console. The account is deleted permanently

Use Case Number: UC7 Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator wishes to add a new user account. System: The Administrator uses the system console as an interface to the system server. Actors: Administrator (initiator), system console Overview: This use case captures the process of adding a new user account. An unused phone number is assigned to a valid IP address.

Use Case Number: UC8 Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator wishes to alter an existing billing plan. System: The Administrator uses the system console as an interface to the system server. Actors: Administrator (initiator), system console Overview: This use case captures the process of changing an existing billing plan. The administrator can choose from a list of existing billing plans. All accounts linked to the changed billing plan are updated.

Use Case Number: UC9 Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator wishes to add a new billing plan. System: The Administrator uses the system console as an interface to the system server. Actors: Administrator (initiator), system console Overview: This use case captures the process of an administrator adding a new billing plan on the system console.

Use Case Number: UC10 Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator wishes to cancel a user account. The user account number is passed as input. System: The Administrator uses the system console as an interface to the system server. Actors: Administrator (initiator), system console Overview: This use case captures the process of canceling a user account given by the specified account number. The administrator must first logon to the system console with a user id and password.

Use Case Number: UC11 Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator wishes to enter a user�s bill payment. System: The Administrator uses the system console as an interface to the system server. Actors: Administrator (initiator), system console Overview: This use case captures the process of the administrator entering a user�s bill payment. The administrator must first logon to the system console with a user id and password.

Use Case Number: UC12 Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator wishes to change the system configurations. System: The Administrator uses the system console as an interface to the system server. Actors: Administrator (initiator) Overview: This use case captures the procedure for the administrator to change the maximum number of concurrent calls and the hardware fault duration time.

Use Case Number: UC13 Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator chooses to view hardware status and run a connectivity test. System: System server, console terminals. Actors: Administrator (initiator) Overview: This use case captures the process the administration running a connectivity test to verify that the user�s phone is connected to the system.
